root.name: LocoCycle
root.description: OverviewLococycle is a game developed by Twisted Pixel Games and scheduled to be a Xbox One launch title. The game is a downloadable only game and goes for $20.LocoCycle stars I.R.I.S Intelligen Reactionary Infiltration System (Lisa Foiles) an experimental motorcycle with a spanish speaking mechanic, Pablo, chained to her. They're both relentlessly pursued by S.P.I.K.E (Robert Patrick), another sentient motorcycle. Partially inspired by Rocksteady's Batman games, as well as a Torque-induced nightmare from Josh Bear, LocoCycle combines melee heavy combat, shooting, and racing.
